snippet: Protests in the capital and in Parliament followed a savage attack on a woman on a private bus as it circled the city, the latest grisly sexual assault in northern India.
abstract: Protests in the capital and in Parliament followed a savage attack on a woman on a private bus as it circled the city, the latest grisly sexual assault in northern India.

byline.original: By NIHARIKA MANDHANA and ANJANI TRIVEDI

headline.main: Indians Outraged Over Rape on Moving Bus in New Delhi
headline.print_headline: Indians Outraged by Account of Gang Rape on a Bus
